<img align="right" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/onrirr/onrirr/main/small.png" alt="Essence logo">

# <h1 style="font-size: 36px">Essence</h1>

Pure, Type-Safe and Minimal template for Discord Bots using [Discord.js v14](https://discord.js.org/)

<h1 style="display: flex; align-items: center; font-size: 24px;"><img src="data:image/png;base64,"/> <span style="margin-left: 16px">Get Started</span> </h1>

After cloning the repository with `git clone`, add your bot token to the `config` file

config:
```
token = XXXXXXXXXXXXXX_XXXXXXX_XXXXXXXXXXXXX
```

Then, install the dependencies and run the bot with `npm run dev`

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```


<h1 style="display: flex; align-items: center; font-size: 24px;"><img src="data:image/png;base64,"/> <span style="margin-left: 16px">Requirements</span> </h1>

- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) v16 or higher

- [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) v4.4 or higher

- [ts-node](https://www.npmjs.com/package/ts-node) v10 or higher

- [nodemon](https://www.npmjs.com/package/nodemon) v2.0 or higher

- [Discord.js](https://discord.js.org/) v14 or higher

<h1 style="display: flex; align-items: center; font-size: 24px;"><img src="data:image/png;base64,"/> <span style="margin-left: 16px">Project Structure</span> </h1>
